mapper.select: select p.*, l.lecture_thumb_renamed, l.lecture_name, t.teacher_name, l.lecture_price, lc.lec_cat_name, l.lecture_intro, round((select avg(lec_assessment) from lecture_comment where ref_lecture_no = l.lecture_no), 1) "avg_lec_assessment" from lecture l inner join lecture_category lc on l.ref_lec_cat_no = lc.lec_cat_no inner join teacher t on l.ref_member_id = t.ref_member_id inner join pick p on p.ref_lecture_no = l.lecture_no where p.ref_member_id = #{refMemberId}
select pick_no from pick where ref_lecture_no = #{refLectureNo} and ref_member_id = #{refMemberId}
mapper.insert: insert into pick( pick_no, ref_member_id, ref_lecture_no, pick_date ) values( seq_pick_no.nextval, #{refMemberId}, #{refLectureNo}, default )
